about_the_game:
Draft Unique Loot
Stash is unlike any other card game, offering an endless pack of truly unique cards to choose from. You'll need to strike a balance between pushing your luck in search of the perfect card and seizing a powerful option before the next battle begins.

Quick, Intuitive Card Selection
Make quick decisions with intuitive swipe-based card selection that feels just like opening a real pack of cards. Thanks to procedural generation, no two choices are ever the same. But don’t let the smoothness fool you—this is a game of deep strategy

Diverse Card Types
Choose from six distinct card types—heroes, weapons, relics, quests, consumables, and upgrades. Craft unique heroes, build strategic advantages, or grab a quick buff to turn the tide of battle.

Asynchronous Multiplayer & Roguelike Progression
Compete against players who came before you in asynchronous multiplayer battles. Draft the right cards and combine them into unique Heroes that your overall strategy perfectly.

Real Loot. No microtransactions.  Real unlockables. No battle pass.
With decks evolving dynamically based on your loot, copying strategies is impossible. Plus, we’re committed to keeping Stash free of microtransactions—no pay-to-win, just pure RNG.

Discover a Post-Human World:
Explore a world map filled with bits of lore and opportunities to unlock new allies, uncover powerful weapons, and expand the pool of cards available in your loot.

Cross-Platform Progression
Play seamlessly across Steam, iOS, and Android. Your progress carries over, so you can continue your adventure anytime, anywhere. Or just enjoy intense battles next to your favorite stream.

Seasonal Content

In Stash, competitive players compete to climb the monthly rankings! The Alpha on the Leaderboard is crowned the King of the Land until a new contender defeats his Deck and ascends to a new level. 

Every season, we will release new Heroes, Weapons and Relics to mix up the challenge.

Timeline:
- To be announced -

name: Stash: A Card Looter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU (Intel i3, AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD 4000 or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU (Intel i3, AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD 4000 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card

short_description: Embark on a unique drafting adventure with an endless array of randomized cards! Transform your one-of-a-kind loot into powerful tactics and take on enemy squads controlled by real players in a post-human world teeming with beasty conflicts.
